name: MT Launcher
description:
The MTC Inc. is a digital distribution platform, developed and maintained by MTC_mango., for Windows . The store allows users to browse and download apps developed with Mustache.io

Play your Favorite games like

Super Meat boy!

Undertale

And Untitled goose

Talk also with the AI!

The AI's name is TM.

TM is a virtual assistant that is part of MT Windows operating systems.

Developed by: MTC_mango

Platform: Windows

Initial release: November 10
